document_data.caption: A map showing the Narrows Trail cutting between the Alimir Mountains and Lake of Steam.
document_data.name: Narrows Trail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Narrows Trail''' was a small trail found along the slopes of the [[Alimir Mountains]] near the [[Lake of Steam]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}<ref name=EotSS.M">
document_data.Geography: The trail originated in the north, branching from [[Darkhope's Road]] northwest of [[Mintar]]. The Narrows Trail passed south, wedged between the eastern face of the Alimir Mountains and the western shore of the Lake of Steam. The trail covered approximately {{SI|220|mi|k|long=yes}} before ending at [[Tulmon]].<ref name=EotSS.M"/>
document_data.Notable Locations: In addition to Tulmon, the other notable city found along the Narrows Trail was [[Yeshpek]]. The [[Pevadaas Trail]] branched from the Narrows Trail's northern section.<ref name=EotSS.M"/>
